name: T&C - Thou Shall Use Me
description:
As designers, we are lovers of typography. We want to draw attention to this little star in this T&C collection. 

Asterisks are commonly used in advertisements to refer readers to special terms/conditions for a certain statement, commonly placed below the statement in question. Asterisks are also used to denote corrections to previously misspelled words, very useful for today's autocorrect technology.

We also word play on human emotion of feeling used vs using the bottle.

We pay tribute to this little star in this T&C collection. We hope you love it as much as we do.

This is a 500ml glass bottle with black screw cap.

Size:
Height: 15cm
Body Diameter: 8cm 

As the glass bottles are fragile, and we want to ensure they reach you in good condition, our shipping is calculate to a maximum of 4 bottles. Kindly contact us if you are ordering more than 4 bottles and we will let you know what is the shipping cost before you place your orders.

name: T&C - Thou Shall Fill Me
description:
As designers, we are lovers of typography. We want to draw attention to this little star in this T&C collection. 

Asterisks are commonly used in advertisements to refer readers to special terms/conditions for a certain statement, commonly placed below the statement in question. Asterisks can also e used to censor swear words and vulgar or objectionable text.

We also word play on human emotion of being filled up vs filling the bottle.

We pay tribute to this little star in this T&C collection. We hope you love it as much as we do.

This is a 500ml glass bottle with black screw cap.

Size:
Height: 15cm
Body Diameter: 8cm 

As the glass bottles are fragile, and we want to ensure they reach you in good condition, our shipping is calculate to a maximum of 4 bottles. Kindly contact us if you are ordering more than 4 bottles and we will let you know what is the shipping cost before you place your orders.

As designers, we are lovers of typography. We want to draw attention to this little star in this T&C collection. 

Asterisks are commonly used in advertisements to refer readers to special terms/conditions for a certain statement, commonly placed below the statement in question. Asterisks are also used to denote corrections to previously misspelled words, very useful for today's autocorrect technology.

As designers, we are lovers of typography. We want to draw attention to this little star in this T&C collection. 

Asterisks are commonly used in advertisements to refer readers to special terms/conditions for a certain statement, commonly placed below the statement in question. Asterisks can also be used to censor swear words and vulgar or objectionable text.

We also word play on human emotion of feeling broken vs breaking the glass bottle.

We pay tribute to this little star in this T&C collection. We hope you love it as much as we do.

name: T&C Set of 4
description:
We love them as a set - each with a different asterisk. They looks great on the shelves, in the kitchen, or even in the fridge. They comes in individual box, so you can give them to different friends if you want to.

We are sorry we do not allow mix and match of design.

These are individual 500ml glass bottle with black screw cap.

Size per bottles:
Height: 15cm
Body Diameter: 8cm 

As the glass bottles are fragile, and we want to ensure they reach you in good condition, our shipping is calculate to a maximum of 4 bottles. Kindly contact us if you are ordering more than 4 bottles and we will let you know what is the shipping cost before you place your orders.

name: Mood Swing - Happy
description:
This collection was born on a rainy sunday afternoon. It was one of those lazy afternoon when we just want to stay at home and read a book. We were inspired by how the weather effects our feelings, or how we sometime describe our bosses' mood using the weather.

Fill the bottle with things that make you happy - candies, stickers, fairy dust... Have fun with it, use it or just display it on the shelf. 

This is a 500ml glass bottle with black screw cap.

Size:
Height: 15cm
Body Diameter: 8cm 

As the glass bottles are fragile, and we want to ensure they reach you in good condition, our shipping is calculate to a maximum of 4 bottles. Kindly contact us if you are ordering more than 4 bottles and we will let you know what is the shipping cost before you place your orders.
